mapper.select: select id, empid, mounth, salary from Salary;
select id, empid, mounth, salary from Salary where id=#{id};
select id, empid, mounth, salary from Salary where empid=#{empid};
select id, empid, mounth, salary from Salary where mounth=#{mounth};
mapper.insert: insert into Salary(id, empid, mounth, salary) values (#{id},#{empid},#{mounth},#{salary})
mapper.update: update Salary set mounth=#{mounth},salary=#{salary} where id=#{id}
